description:
When it comes to web development, there is a fairly small range of Ruby frameworks to choose from. The choice depends on finding the right tool for the job at hand. Here’s our pick of the finest Ruby web frameworks.

The post 6 Top Free and Open-Source Ruby Web Frameworks appeared first on Linux Today.
title: 6 Top Free and Open-Source Ruby Web Frameworks

description:
Odoo, previously recognized as OpenERP, is a collection of open-source business applications. It is a highly utilized open-source enterprise resource planning (ERP) software. In this tutorial, we will demonstrate the process of how you can install Odoo 17 on Ubuntu 24.04 servers.

The post How to Install Odoo 17 on Ubuntu 24.04 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Install Odoo 17 on Ubuntu 24.04

description:
Computer typesetting systems let you generate high-quality documentation, including books, with minimal effort.

The post 5 Handy Free Linux Typesetting Systems appeared first on Linux Today.
title: 5 Handy Free Linux Typesetting Systems

description:
This tutorial describes how to create ad hoc shell environments to test a package without installing it using Nix package manager in Linux.

The post How to Test a Package Without Installing It Using Nix in Linux appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Test a Package Without Installing It Using Nix in Linux
